description: Fix broken import in portal-domain-sessions-prune.ts: change 'server/src/lib/models/PortalDomainSessionToken' to '@alga-psa/auth'
Add DocumentAssociation export to packages/documents/src/models/index.ts barrel
Update documentActions.upload.test.ts to mock DocumentAssociation from @alga-psa/documents/models/documentAssociation instead of server/src/models/document-association
Update documentPermissionsIntegration.test.ts to import DocumentAssociation from @alga-psa/documents/models/documentAssociation instead of server/src/models/document-association
Delete server/src/models/document-association.ts after all callers migrated
Update surveyService.ts to import from @alga-psa/email instead of ../lib/email
Delete server/src/lib/email/index.ts re-export shim (verify no remaining source callers first)
Create packages/storage/ directory with package.json (name: @alga-psa/storage, dependencies: @alga-psa/db, @alga-psa/core, @alga-psa/auth, @alga-psa/event-bus, @alga-psa/shared, @alga-psa/validation)
Create packages/storage/project.json with tags [scope:storage, type:horizontal]
Create packages/storage/tsconfig.json extending root tsconfig
Move types/storage.ts from documents to packages/storage/src/types/storage.ts
Move config/storage.ts from documents to packages/storage/src/config/storage.ts
Move providers/StorageProvider.ts from documents to packages/storage/src/providers/StorageProvider.ts

Move StorageProviderFactory.ts from documents to packages/storage/src/StorageProviderFactory.ts
Move StorageService.ts from documents to packages/storage/src/StorageService.ts
Update all internal imports within moved files to use correct relative paths within packages/storage/
Create packages/storage/src/index.ts barrel exporting StorageService, StorageProviderFactory, generateStoragePath, FileStoreModel, FileStore type, StorageError, storage config functions
Set up package.json exports field for @alga-psa/storage with subpaths: ., ./StorageService, ./types/storage, ./providers/StorageProvider, ./config/storage

Update server/src/app/api/documents/view/[fileId]/route.ts: import StorageProviderFactory from @alga-psa/storage

Update packages/documents/src/lib/entityImageService.ts to import StorageService from @alga-psa/storage/StorageService

Update packages/documents/package.json exports to re-export ./storage/StorageService and ./types/storage from @alga-psa/storage equivalents
Add @alga-psa/storage as dependency in packages/documents/package.json
Add @alga-psa/storage as dependency in packages that consume it: billing, client-portal, jobs

Remove storage-related source files from packages/documents/src/ (storage/StorageService.ts, storage/StorageProviderFactory.ts, storage/providers/*, config/storage.ts, types/storage.ts, models/storage.ts)
Register @alga-psa/storage in workspace tsconfig paths and NX workspace configuration
